title: Do you get mastery tokens in aram
body: Do you get lvl 6 tokens in an aram game, (I got an S on my lvl 5 Kha zix)

replies.body:
You do not get mastery tokens in ARAM, twisted treeline, or rotating game mode queues. 

> Mastery level 6 and 7 have a higher competitive bar as far as performance requirements. Alternate game modes are intended to offer variety in play with a less competitive standard for players. We want to maintain mastery levels 6 and 7 as achievements specific to high performance in competition, so they will only be achievable in SR modes. - [**Riot Socrates**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/chromas-yorick-and-champ-mastery-ask-riot)
